title: FS: T206 HOF Portraits SGC Graded ALL SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: T206 HOF Portraits SGC Graded ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:

Roger Bresnahan....SC 350...........SGC 40....SOLD
Fred Clarke...........Piedmont 350...SGC 50....SOLD

Vic Willis..............SC 150............SGC 50......SOLD

Hey Tony:
I'll take the Willis.
Give me a shout..

Willis to Doug
Collins to Michael
Jennings and Beckley to Jim

Bresnahan & Clarke to Jeff.
Thanks to all!
